name: Hero Hunk 150cc Motor Bike
description: Hero has used 149.2cc engine in this Hunk 150 bike, which is Air cooled, 4 Stroke 2 Valve Single cylinder OHC. The bike is capable of generating a maximum power of 15.6 Bhp @ 8500 rpm and a maximum torque of 13.50 Nm @ 7000 rpm. The bike is capable of running at a maximum speed of about 107 Kmph. The Hunk 150 bike has an average mileage of about 45 Kmpl.

name: Honda CBR150R Motor Bike - 150 cc
description: The CBR150R is one of the stylish latest super bikes of Honda. Including its outstanding features like - sporty look and wonderful color combination along with liquid-cooled powerful engine which included a program fuel injection. In comparison, its price is higher in Bangladesh, but its demand for fashion-based Bangladeshis is above all. The CBR sports bikes are a big part of the motor sports world. Yamaha R15 v3, Suzuki GSX R150 are the strong competitors of this super dashing bike.

name: Fastrack special Mens Watch
description: This analog watch for men has a grey, round-shaped dial, with plain three hands, a stainless steel case with a crown, Arabic numerals in black and baton hour markings in green for third, sixth, ninth and twelfth-hour positions. Made of plastic, its black strap is secured by a buckle closure. It has 5atm water-resistant depth.

name: Toshiba THB-LED-43V35P 43" FHD LED Smart TV
description: A smart TV, also known as a connected TV (CTV), is a traditional television set with integrated Internet and interactive Web 2.0 features, which allows users to stream music and videos, browse the internet, and view photos. Smart TVs are a technological convergence of computers, televisions, and digital media players. Toshiba is a consumer electronics giant that produces everything from televisions to batteries. The company has its headquarters in Tokyo, Japan and is popular for producing high quality electronic products that are durable and innovative. Toshiba televisions are especially popular in Bangladesh

name: Sony Bravia KD-65X7500H 65" 4K Ultra HD Smart Android TV
description: Model: KD-65x7500H 65 inch 4K UHD(3840 x 2160) LCD Display. Youtube, Netflix, USB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth supports. Size: 1101 x 645 x 57mm(without stand)
